abstract: Toyota Industries said on Monday that it planned to buy the Cascade Corporation for $759 million in cash as part of its plan to expand globally.
snippet: Toyota Industries said on Monday that it planned to buy the Cascade Corporation for $759 million in cash as part of its plan to expand globally.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese auto parts maker Toyota Industries said on Monday that it planned to buy the Cascade Corporation for $759 million in cash as part of an effort to expand globally.

headline.main: Toyota Industries to Buy Cascade for $759 Million

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
